title: 1999/386/EC: Council Decision of 7 June 1999 on the provisional application by the European Community of the Agreement on the International Dolphin Conservation Programme
header:
COUNCIL DECISION
of 7 June 1999
on the provisional application by the European Community of the Agreement on the International Dolphin Conservation Programme
(1999/386/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: In accordance with Article XXIX thereof, the Agreement on the International Dolphin Conservation Programme shall apply provisionally in the European Community with effect from 1 June 1999.

The President of the Council shall designate the person authorised to notify the provisional application of the Agreement by the Community to the Government of the United States of America as Depositary of the Agreement.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 7 June 1999.
For the Council
The President
E. BULMAHN
